title: Unrooted
description: Unrooted is an homage to games like Jump King and Foddian st y le platformers. It will make you slam your desk with rage or leap for joy as you make that one jump you’ve been missing for hours. Travel upwards, discovering new hand painted environments , mocking NPCs, and musical landscapes that will encourage you to adventure farther than you had before. Fields of Mistria

system_requirements.Graphics: Shader Model 3 support, 512MB VRAM, Intel® HD  5500 or better
